## SendableFluid.withdrawCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by withdrawing some of its collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdrawCollateral(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentFluidTransaction<S, FluidReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of collateral to withdraw from the Trove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentFluidTransaction](./lib-base.sentfluidtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [FluidReceipt](./lib-base.fluidreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ withdrawCollateral: amount })

```
